name: Borderline - Life On The Line
description:
Attention skydivers, race car drivers and crazy storm chasers: THIS IS THE GAME FOR YOU!!! How fast can you react? How long can you stay in the line? Try this all new extreme & fast-paced arcade game!

Hold the left and right sides of the screen to guide the line and avoid obstacles.

Features:
>> Free to play!
>> Endless gameplay
>> Challenging levels
>> Multiplayer game!
>> Compete with players from all over the globe!
>> Addictive and fun for all ages!
